items.text: Gather resources to build a [house](House) with a [table](Tables), a [chair](Chairs), and a [door](Doors) for the {npc Guide}(Guide) to move in
Gather ores to improve your [tools](Tools), [armor](Armor) and [weapons](Weapons) with [silver](Silver_Ore)/[tungsten](Tungsten_Ore)
Explore [caverns](Cavern), find some [Life Crystals](Life_Crystal), and **consume a maximum of 4 of them for now**
Collect some [Fallen Stars](Fallen_Star) to craft some [Mana Crystals](Mana_Crystal) and use them to increase your mana (200 maximum)
Buy a [Piggy Bank](Piggy_Bank) from the {npc Merchant}(Merchant) and put your coins in it to save them from being lost on death
Craft a [Grappling Hook](Hooks#Grappling_Hook) to help you navigate the world more easily
Craft some [Spelunker Potions](Spelunker_Potion) to illuminates nearby ores, gems, chests and other valuable objects
Upgrade your gear with [gold](Gold_Ore)/[platinum](Platinum_Ore)
Unlock the NPCs (see below)
Defeat the boss (see below)
Build a house for each of the following NPCs
{npc Merchant}(Merchant): get 50 silver [coins](Coins)
{npc Nurse}(Nurse): use a [Life Crystal](Life_Crystal)
{npc Demolitionist}(Demolitionist): get an [explosive](Explosives)
{npc Dye Trader}(Dye_Trader): find a [dye plant](Plants#Dye_plants)
{npc Stylist}(Stylist): free the NPC trapped in a [spiders nest](Spider_Nest)
{npc Angler}(Angler): talk to the sleeping NPC in the ocean biome
{npc Arms Dealer}(Arms_Dealer): find at least one [bullet](Bullets) or a bullet-firing [gun](Guns)
{npc Painter}(Painter): have encountered at least 8 town NPCs
{npc Dryad}(Dryad): defeat the {boss Eye of Cthulhu}(Eye_of_Cthulhu)
üõ°Ô∏è Gear up for the next fights ([weapons](Weapons), [potions](Potions) & [armor](Armor))
Increase your maximum mana to 200 if you use mana-consuming weapons
Increase your health points to 200 by using a fifth [Life Crystal](Life_Crystal)
{boss Eye of Cthulhu}(Eye_of_Cthulhu): unlock the boss spawning (at night) by having at least 200 HP and 4 town NPCs **or** by using a [Suspicious Looking Eye](Suspicious_Looking_Eye)
Farm the {boss Eye of Cthulhu}(Eye_of_Cthulhu) for [demonite](Demonite_Ore)/[crimtane](Crimtane_Ore) ores and upgrade your gear
Get some [Purification Powder](Purification_Powder) by crafting it or by buying it from the {npc Dryad}(Dryad)
Defeat {boss Eater of Worlds}(Eater_of_Worlds)/{boss Brain of Cthulhu}(Brain_of_Cthulhu) to trigger a [meteor crash](Meteorite_(biome)) (50% chance) the next midnight (see below)
Mine completely the [meteorite](Meteorite) and upgrade your gear
Buy [Rocket Boots](Rocket_Boots) (5 gold coins) from the {npc Goblin Tinkerer}(Goblin_Tinkerer)

chapters.label: IV. The Hell
chapters.note: The world will now enter Hardmode introducing new and powerful monsters and ores. Corruption will also spread much faster.

chapters.label: VII. The Green Inferno
chapters.note: Defeating Plantera slows the corruption spread by 50%.

chapters.label: VIII. The Ritual
chapters.note: At night, summon all Mecanical Bosses and defeat them simultaneously to get a rare achievement.

chapters.label: IX. The King of the Oceans
